#summary frequently asked questions

= "there is no model to interpet after workflow execution" =

an error occured during execution of the workflow that caused the model transformation to fail and there is no model in the slot to interpret. 
 * make sure you load a workflow from a plugin that is in the workspace in the filesystem. imports that are just a pointer to a projects real location can not be used.
 * try to strip down your workflow to the visualization steps, if you are running a generator before that failes, the model won't be created. try making a workflow that only loads the model or invokes the model-transformation
